I got the magic in my palm So I got to flower some new words to play with
New romance, new flowers, new home and new life New hope, good song, rock the round ball
Whoa, whoa, whoa, that combo Won't go, go, go with any flow

Drawing these pictures does not make me richer Only the sight of you does
